twooter

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • twooter.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable container class for a single Twoot

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long expires
      The number of seconds until this message expires and is removed
      java.lang.String id
      This message unique ID
      java.lang.String message
      The message contents itself
      java.lang.String name
      Which user posted this message
      long published
      When the message was publised, as a UNIX timestamp in seconds.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final java.lang.String id
        This message unique ID

      • name

        public final java.lang.String name
        Which user posted this message

      • message

        public final java.lang.String message
        The message contents itself

      • published

        public final long published
        When the message was publised, as a UNIX timestamp in seconds. UNIX times are expressed as the total number of seconds since 00:00:00 1 January 1970. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time for more details.

      • expires

        public final long expires
        The number of seconds until this message expires and is removed

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String message,
               long published,
               long expires)
        Creates a new twooter.Message, which is then immutable
        Parameters:
        id - The message ID - This can be used to find the message again on the Twooter service.
        name - The name of the user who posted this message - This can be used to find other posts by this user.
        message - The message text itself.
        published - The number of seconds since the UNIX epoch when this message was posted (effectively the date and time of the post) in seconds.
        expires - The number of seconds remaining before this post will expire - All posts are eventually deleted on the server.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a human-readable form of this message, as a String.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
